      HttpRequest withData(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
      Builds query on format of key1=v1&key2=v2 from given hashMap structure for map: {name=Bubu, age=29} -> builds "name=Bubu&age=29" for map: {Iam=Groot} -> builds "Iam=Groot"

      Writes query to open stream to server
      HttpRequest withHeaders(java.lang.String... headers)
      Adding request headers (standard format "Key":"Value")

      • withData

        public HttpRequest withData(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Builds query on format of key1=v1&key2=v2 from given hashMap structure for map: {name=Bubu, age=29} -> builds "name=Bubu&age=29" for map: {Iam=Groot} -> builds "Iam=Groot"
        Parameters:
        params - HashMap consists of key-> value pairs to build query from

        HttpRequest this instance -> for chaining method @see line 22
